name: Enshrined (dhxmpyr)
description:
Cyrano Val D'allaire, physician & occult scholar, takes a detour to the remote town of Squall's Peak to pay respects to an old friend.  A short , gothic-styled visual novel involving vampires and a creepy old mansion in the woods.

Content Warnings: depictions of blood, violence & death.

~10,000 word story (approx 45 min runtime, depending on reading speed).

Linear story/one ending, no choices or branching paths.

Original illustrations including: character sprites, backgrounds & CGs.

Browser playable (or if using windows, please use the download available below).

All writing, art, etc by me.

All music & sfx from https://dova-s.jp/EN/ & https://mixkit.co/ .

'Enshrined' is a short kinetic visual novel. It was made over the past few months as part of my final semester work & with it being the first VN I've seen to completion-  it's probably a little messy or rough around the edges. I'm predominantly a visual artist and still learning to get better at other things so it's pretty simplistic but! I hope to make more complex & polished games in the future! 

Thanks to all who play. <3

----------------------------------------------------
